sentence.text: Clinical features of affected individuals with LGD variants in N-terminal protein amino acid acetylation include variable levels of intellectual disability, delayed speech and motor milestones, and autism spectrum disorder.

Further supporting a mechanism of haploinsufficiency, individuals with copy-number variant (CNV) deletions involving N-terminal protein amino acid acetylation and surrounding genes can present with mild intellectual disability, mild dysmorphic features, motor delays, and decreased growth.
